ref: 2544 *ōṭṭā ʻ shelter, screen ʼ. 2. *ōttā -- , which is therefore prob. not < *apagupta -- or *avag˚. 3. *ōḍḍā -- . [Poss. further conn. with *ōḍḍh -- ʻ dress, cover ʼ, but to be separated from forms < *apaghaṭya -- , ˚ghāṭa -- , ˚ghāṭayati]
S. oṭa f. ʻ protection, shelter ʼ;
P. oṭ f. ʻ support, shelter ʼ;
P. oṭ f. ʻ support, shelter ʼ;
H. oṭ f. ʻ obstruction ʼ, oṭal f. ʻ screen ʼ, oṭnā ʻ to cover, screen ʼ;
G. oṭ f. ʻ curtain, partition ʼ, oṭlī f., ˚lɔ m. ʻ veranda, porch, raised platform to sit on ʼ;
M. oṭī f. ʻ veranda or unwalled space in front of or behind central space ʼ, oṭā m. ʻ parapet along terrace, raised mass of earth or bricks ʼ.
